---
Seminar \#1 - Mermaid
===
###### tags: ```TKPM-Mermaid```

## Cú pháp ```mermaid```

[https://mermaid-js.github.io/mermaid/#/](https://mermaid-js.github.io/mermaid/#/)

## Luyện tập

Sử dụng cú pháp `mermaid`, vẽ các diagram sau:

### Flow Chart

- Euclide GCD

### Class Diagram

[![](https://mermaid.ink/img/eyJjb2RlIjoiY2xhc3NEaWFncmFtXG4gICAgXG5cdEFkZHJlc3MgXCIxXCIgLS0qIFwiMVwiIEN1c3RvbWVyOiBIYXNcblx0Q3VzdG9tZXIgXCIxXCIgLS0gXCIqXCIgUHJvZHVjdDogUHVyY2hhc2VzXG5cdFByZW1pdW1DdXN0b21lciAtLXw-IEN1c3RvbWVyXG5cdFJlZ3VsYXJDdXN0b21lciAtLXw-IEN1c3RvbWVyXG5cdEJpbGwgLS1vIEN1c3RvbWVyOiBCZWxvbmdzIHRvXG5cdEJpbGwgLi58PiBQYXltZW50IENvdW50ZXI6IEFjY2VwdHNcblx0QmlsbCAuLj4gRGlzY291bnRcblx0QmlsbCAuLj4gUHVyY2hhc2VEZXRhaWxcblx0RGlzY291bnQgLi4--PiBQYXltZW50IENvdW50ZXJcblx0UGF5bWVudCBDb3VudGVyOiBjYWxjdWxhdGVQYXlhYmxlQW10KClcblx0UGF5bWVudCBDb3VudGVyOiBnZW5lcmF0ZUJpbGwoKSIsIm1lcm1haWQiOnsidGhlbWUiOiJmb3Jlc3QifX0)](https://mermaid-js.github.io/mermaid-live-editor/#/edit/eyJjb2RlIjoiY2xhc3NEaWFncmFtXG4gICAgXG5cdEFkZHJlc3MgXCIxXCIgLS0qIFwiMVwiIEN1c3RvbWVyOiBIYXNcblx0Q3VzdG9tZXIgXCIxXCIgLS0gXCIqXCIgUHJvZHVjdDogUHVyY2hhc2VzXG5cdFByZW1pdW1DdXN0b21lciAtLXw-IEN1c3RvbWVyXG5cdFJlZ3VsYXJDdXN0b21lciAtLXw-IEN1c3RvbWVyXG5cdEJpbGwgLS1vIEN1c3RvbWVyOiBCZWxvbmdzIHRvXG5cdEJpbGwgLi58PiBQYXltZW50IENvdW50ZXI6IEFjY2VwdHNcblx0QmlsbCAuLj4gRGlzY291bnRcblx0QmlsbCAuLj4gUHVyY2hhc2VEZXRhaWxcblx0RGlzY291bnQgLi4--PiBQYXltZW50IENvdW50ZXJcblx0UGF5bWVudCBDb3VudGVyOiBjYWxjdWxhdGVQYXlhYmxlQW10KClcblx0UGF5bWVudCBDb3VudGVyOiBnZW5lcmF0ZUJpbGwoKSIsIm1lcm1haWQiOnsidGhlbWUiOiJmb3Jlc3QifX0)

### Sequence Diagram

[![](https://mermaid.ink/img/eyJjb2RlIjoic2VxdWVuY2VEaWFncmFtXG4gICAgcGFydGljaXBhbnQgQ3VzdG9tZXJcblxuICAgIEN1c3RvbWVyLT4-K1NlYXJjaFBhZ2U6IDE6b25TZWFyY2goYXV0aG9yKVxuICAgIFNlYXJjaFBhZ2UtPj5TZWFyY2hQYWdlOiAxLjE6dmFsaWRhdGVTZWFyY2hDcml0ZXJpYSgpXG4gICAgXG4gICAgYWx0IGF1dGhvciBlbnRlcmVkXG4gICAgICAgIFNlYXJjaFBhZ2UtPj4rQ2F0YWxvZzoxLjI6c2VhcmNoQnlBdXRob3IoYXV0aG9yKVxuICAgICAgICBDYXRhbG9nLT4-K1NlYXJjaFJlc3VsdDogMS4yLjE6Y3JlYXRlKClcbiAgICAgICAgU2VhcmNoUmVzdWx0LT4-LVNlYXJjaFJlc3VsdFBhZ2U6IDEuMi4xLjE6ZGlzcGxheSgpXG4gICAgZWxzZSBhdXRob3Igbm90IGVudGVyZWRcbiAgICAgICAgU2VhcmNoUGFnZS0-Pi1TZWFyY2hQYWdlOjEuMzpkaXNwbGF5RXJyb3JNZXNzYWdlKClcbiAgICBlbmQiLCJtZXJtYWlkIjp7InRoZW1lIjoiZGVmYXVsdCJ9LCJ1cGRhdGVFZGl0b3IiOmZhbHNlfQ)](https://mermaid-js.github.io/mermaid-live-editor/#/edit/eyJjb2RlIjoic2VxdWVuY2VEaWFncmFtXG4gICAgcGFydGljaXBhbnQgQ3VzdG9tZXJcblxuICAgIEN1c3RvbWVyLT4-K1NlYXJjaFBhZ2U6IDE6b25TZWFyY2goYXV0aG9yKVxuICAgIFNlYXJjaFBhZ2UtPj5TZWFyY2hQYWdlOiAxLjE6dmFsaWRhdGVTZWFyY2hDcml0ZXJpYSgpXG4gICAgXG4gICAgYWx0IGF1dGhvciBlbnRlcmVkXG4gICAgICAgIFNlYXJjaFBhZ2UtPj4rQ2F0YWxvZzoxLjI6c2VhcmNoQnlBdXRob3IoYXV0aG9yKVxuICAgICAgICBDYXRhbG9nLT4-K1NlYXJjaFJlc3VsdDogMS4yLjE6Y3JlYXRlKClcbiAgICAgICAgU2VhcmNoUmVzdWx0LT4-LVNlYXJjaFJlc3VsdFBhZ2U6IDEuMi4xLjE6ZGlzcGxheSgpXG4gICAgZWxzZSBhdXRob3Igbm90IGVudGVyZWRcbiAgICAgICAgU2VhcmNoUGFnZS0-Pi1TZWFyY2hQYWdlOjEuMzpkaXNwbGF5RXJyb3JNZXNzYWdlKClcbiAgICBlbmQiLCJtZXJtYWlkIjp7InRoZW1lIjoiZGVmYXVsdCJ9LCJ1cGRhdGVFZGl0b3IiOmZhbHNlfQ)
